# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Initialize an instance of this type that matches the specified exit status.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ exitStatus: ExitStatus)
```

## Parameters

- **exitStatus**: The particular exit status this condition should match.
title: init(_:)
